resources.string:
Advance Call Timer and Logger

Easy, Smart, Elegant

Keep Track of your chargeable minutes and save your bills
Categorize your Local, STD, Roaming, ISD, and Free Minutes automagically\nNo manual entry needed
This is first time setup wizard\nLet\'s setup your usage/plan details
Please wait till we complete Log Analysis.
Application has detected some numbers which are ambiguous to categorize.\nDo you want to categorize them now?\n(This will improve local and std calls categorization.)
Select how your operator costs you

By downloading or using the app, these terms will automatically apply to you – you should make sure therefore that you read them carefully before using the app. We are offering you this app to use for your own personal use without cost, but you should be aware that you cannot send it on to anyone else, and you’re not allowed to copy, or modify the app, any part of the app, or our trademarks in any way. You’re not allowed to attempt to extract the source code of the app, and you also should not try to translate the app into other languages, or make derivative versions. The app itself, and all the trade marks, copyright, database rights and other intellectual property rights related to it, still belong to 3vaDroid.

Call-E is committed to ensuring that the app is as useful and efficient as possible. For that reason, we reserve the right to make changes to the app or to charge for its services, at any time and for any reason. We will never charge you for the app or its services without making it very clear to you exactly what you’re paying for.

Call-E cannot take responsibility for the app not working at full functionality such as wrong minute counting or, if you have modified the app data or the system Call Logs or You have turned off the phone immediately after call or other malfunction happens in OS. Call-E does not anonymously takes or sends personal data to anywhere. Call-E just read call Logs to get minutes information and stores it in its personal local database. If your Call Log details are misused by some hacker, or third party Call-E does not take any responsibilities for that.

At some point we may wish to update the app. The app is currently available on Android and you’ll need to download the updates if you want to keep using the app. Call-E does not promise that it will always update the app so that it is relevant to you and/or works with the Android version that you have installed on your device. However, you promise to always accept updates to the application when offered to you, We may also wish to stop providing the app, and may terminate use of it at any time without giving notice of termination to you. Unless we tell you otherwise, upon any termination, (a) the rights and licenses granted to you in these terms will end; (b) you must stop using the app, and (if needed) delete it from your device.
Please read & accept Terms and Conditions
Your minutes will reset on date %d of every month
Select Start Date of Your Bill Cycle
Delete all data and settings of this application
FAQs and help to use the app

Advance Call Timer and Logger
Version 1.1

Copyright 2014-2015.

Shows toast after calls of how many minutes are used.
Select whether to calculate call in Minutes or in Seconds
Add your CUG, Customer Care, Toll Free phone numbers which do not charge call cost
Add phone numbers which are considered to be local calls if app detects them wrongly
Add phone numbers which are considered to be STD calls if app detects them wrongly
Resetting app will delete all Logs, all saved settings. Do you want to continue?
Please enter a Valid Mobile Number
You have changed your local operator circle. It is recommended to review your user specified local and STD numbers for correct categorization.

Do you want to add Numbers which are not charged by operator, like Customer Care and Closed User Group(CUG) numbers?\n\nYou can do it letter from Settings.If you need any help you can go to Help section in Settings.

Minutes: Select this mode if your carrier charges on per minute basis (e.g. Rs. 0.80/Min). 30 sec call is considered as a one minute.\n\nSeconds: Select this mode if your carrier charges you on per second basis(e.g. 1p/1sec). 30 second call is not rounded off to minutes.
Click on below items for detailed Log info
Free minutes are not added in Outgoing total
Please Enter a Valid Mobile Number
